icon.heading: Intermediate Trails
icon.description: Moderately sloped trails that are challenging in some places

icon.heading: Advanced Trails
icon.description: Steeply sloped trails that are challenging from top to bottom

icon.heading: Expert Trails
icon.description: Trails include cliffs, chutes and cornices suitable for experts only

icon.heading: Terrain Park
icon.description: Man made obstacles for jumping and sliding

icon.heading: Snowmaking
icon.description: Areas where man-made snow is generated

icon.heading: Recently Groomed
icon.description: Trails that have been groomed the past 24 hrs

icon.heading: Web Cams
icon.description: Photos from fixed locations taken within the last hour

icon.heading: Photos
icon.description: Photos of skiers and snowboarders in action from around the resort

icon.heading: Videos
icon.description: Videos of skiers and snowboarders in action from around the resort
